about_the_game:
Fever Dream: Escape the nightmare 'Ignatius' has trapped your soul in. Survival is key. You aren't alone in the dream, but only you have the power to escape!

Features

  • Realistic Situation: No map, no text, no direction, only your instincts will save you.
  • Darkness: Evil things lurk in the dark. Your only friend is the light reflecting the last bit of good within you.
  • Agility: You have the physical and spiritual skills to navigate the dream, but I know it may not seem that way.

What you will discover in Fever Dream

  • The dream has many hidden Easter eggs within.
  • The demons lurking within only desire to harm you.
  • Being an explorer can give you an advantage.
  • There are plenty of optional situations littered throughout the dream.

About IndieCore

Caleb Dunahee set out to create his own Indie game after being inspired by other game developers. He plans on creating many more games to come.

content_descriptors.notes: There are frequent views of cartoon like blood and gore. One area of the map includes a corpse stuck up on a tree. There are multiple serial killer NPCs. There is loud music and sounds. There is the use of the "F" word. There is fictional talk about demons.

detailed_description:
3D Platformer FOR PC ONLY

Fever Dream is a 3D platformer built for Windows computer systems. Fever Dream is not compatible with Mac.


Extreme Difficulty

Fever Dream is an extremely difficult game. I highly recommend using a keyboard and mouse to play. I do NOT recommend Trackpads.
